# Mathematical Modelling of Infectious Diseases (Malaria)

This intensive two-week program provides comprehensive training in mathematical modeling of infectious diseases with a focus on malaria. The curriculum covers fundamental concepts in epidemiology, advanced modelling techniques, economic evaluation, and effective communication of modelling results to stakeholders.
